account_type.description: Type of customer account (free, pro, enterprise)

llm_config.begin_message: Hello! Thanks for calling support. How can I help you today?

tools.name: end_call
tools.description: End the call when the customer's issue is resolved or if they request to end the conversation.

tools.name: transfer_to_specialist
tools.description: Transfer to a specialist when the issue requires technical expertise beyond the agent's capabilities.

post_call_analysis_data.name: issue_resolved
post_call_analysis_data.description: Was the customer's issue fully resolved during the call?

post_call_analysis_data.name: issue_category
post_call_analysis_data.description: Category of the customer's issue (billing, technical, shipping, other)

post_call_analysis_data.name: customer_satisfaction
post_call_analysis_data.description: Estimated customer satisfaction level (satisfied, neutral, dissatisfied)
